overview: Role play, based on the children's-youth tale by German-born writer Ilse Losa, 'The Blue Flower'.  Filmed in the Alfama neighborhood, with the collaboration of residents of Rua da Galé, this is a story of friendship in a neighborhood, between children, an old lady and some jugglers.  With the circus participation of Teresa Ricou.
title: Flor Azul
